(QUARTERLY DATA)

quarter_data.csv

corp_profit_aftertax_without
https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CP
Units: Billions of Dollars, Seasonally Adjusted Annual Rate
Corporate Profits After Tax (without IVA and CCAdj)

corp_profit_aftertax_with
https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPATAX
Units: Billions of Dollars, Seasonally Adjusted Annual Rate
Corporate Profits After Tax with Inventory Valuation Adjustment (IVA) and Capital Consumption Adjustment (CCAdj)

corp_profit_beforetax_without
https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/A053RC1Q027SBEA
Units: Billions of Dollars, Seasonally Adjusted Annual Rate
National income: Corporate profits before tax (without IVA and CCAdj)

fed_debt_precent_gdp
https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/GFDEGDQ188S
Units: Percent of GDP, Seasonally Adjusted
Federal Debt: Total Public Debt as Percent of Gross Domestic Product

m1_velocity
https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/M1V
Units: Ratio, Seasonally Adjusted
Velocity of M1 Money Stock
